document_data.name: Magreb
document_data.mainbody: '''Magreb''' was a ranger who watched out a small stretch of the [[Cloud Peaks|Cloud Peak mountains]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Magreb watched over the land alongside his companion [[Rilsa]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, a horde of [[goblin]]s took up residence with a cave near the home of the old [[mage]] [[Adoy]]. After they fell under the sway of a [[hobgoblin]] named [[Rogdok]], the goblins killed Rilsa, leaving Magreb saddened and a bit paranoid.

Following Rilsa's death, Magreb wanted to recover her remains and take vengeance on her killers.
